Class MountainRoute

java.lang.Object
  Route
      MountainRoute

public class MountainRoute
extends Route

This class inherits from the Route class and implement mountain routes. It will keep track of how many X's there are on the route. The X's indicate how many mountains there are on that route. It will also keep track of the length of the route, the color of the route,and the two cities that are connected by the route.

Version:
April 15, 2013
Author:
Chan Tran, Dan Egan, Damian Crisafulli, Andrew Reynolds, Matt Brancato

Constructor Detail

MountainRoute

public MountainRoute(City c1,
                     City c2,
                     int lng,
                     Color c,
                     int x)
This constructor will set up a mountain route. It uses the arguments from the parameters in order to set up the mountain route.

Parameters:
c1 - the name of first city
c2 - the name of second city
lng - the length of the route
c - the Color on the route
x - the number of X's on the mountain of that route
Method Detail

getXs

public int getXs()
This method will return the number of X's on the route, where the X is the number of mountains on that specific route.

Returns:
the number of mountains on a route
